data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 9,546 believers in the county of Pratapgarh to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pratapgarh, Rajasthan, India

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Pratapgarh, Rajasthan, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Pratapgarh. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Pratapgarh, Rajasthan, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, guide seekers in Pratapgarh, Rajasthan, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Pratapgarh, Rajasthan, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Pratapgarh, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

location.name: Pratapgarh
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Sankliwal, Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions), Jat Dhankar, Brahmin Tapodhan, Sarera (Sikh traditions)
